Plastic Injection Manager (Trưởng Phòng Đúc Nhựa)
Plastic Injection Manager (Trưởng Phòng Đúc Nhựa)
Công Ty TNHH Samsung SDI Việt Nam (SDIV)
Khu Công Nghiệp Yên Phong 1 - Yên Trung - Yên Phong - Bắc Ninh

- Manage production manpower - Manage production KPI target - Support technical skills to technical staffs - Follow production plan to get capacity - Control the cost down activities - Control Kaizen activities - Give the production manpower efficiency - Train staffs and make monthly assessment
- Have at least 12 year experience in plastics injection/mold - Good knowledge of TPM, Six sigma, 7 QC -tool... - Good solving problem skills - Good leadership - English is compulsory

and.attribute: Samsung SDI Vietnam Co., Ltd (SDIV) was established in 2009, is a member of Samsung Corporation. SDIV is specializing in manufacturing mobile phone battery to provide Samsung mobile, Nokia mobile. SDIV are aimed at becoming SDI group largest factory of Green Battery. SDIV is A So Good Company with the most competitive and attractive working conditions, we are proud of offering a multiple cultural working environment to those dynamic candidates who deserves variety of chances and challenges of promotion, benefits and more and more. Joining SDIV is a best way to affirm your career’s prospect.
